channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MA

item.title: Report X-2024072252
item.description:
Report X-2024072252

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-06T15:14:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-07
  • City: East Boston
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On July 7th a package was found during the PM sort that was leaking. The package was marked as UN3082, ENVIRONMENTALLY HAZARDOUS SUBSTANCE LIQUID N.O.S, 9, III. The package was placed into a drum and an amended shippers declaration was requested.
